name: Star Trek Voyager Basic
overview: A great looking Star Trek game created by SteveBoy aka István Maros. Star date 48308.2, it is your mission as a member of the Star Ship Voyager NCC-74656 to assist repairs to the ship by solving the logic, memory and puzzle games and repair the various systems. Failures can raise the alert status to Yellow Alert and then to Red Alert if things go very poorly. Keep your cool, use your mind and follow the prime directive when convenient.
